 2011-00542011-02-03HC,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanada Consumer Product Safety Act
SubjectCandles Regulations
PrecisCANDLES REGULATIONS - will be made from Item 29 of Part I of Schedule I to the Hazardous Products Act, in order to continue to prohibit spontaneously reigniting candles and to address gaps that otherwise would have been created by the coming into force of the Canada Consumer Product Safety Act on June 20, 2011.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2011-0018 Publication Date: 2011-02-16
